review_text: The house was as described. Safe neighborhood and comfortable beds. Neighbors have a little dog/dogs that bark all night. If you are a light sleeper, this could be irritating.
Excellent place to stay! Was perfect for our little family!
very responsive and accommodating host, let me checkout a little later than scheduled with no problem, would definitely recommend if you're in the area
Clean environment, felt at home very cozy. Owners are friendly and communicate within the hour.
Great stay

Spotless home with plenty of space. Comfortable beds and all the amenities you could need in your home away from home. Quiet neighborhood and easy to find. Rocio and Juan very clear communication about anything you ask.
Really appreciated
Check in was smooth, bed was comfy, and the place was clean. :)
It was a great place to stay and only 5 mins from the location I needed to be at.
Perfect for our weekend getaway! Loved Cielo Restaurant!
awesome spot

Carson was a great host ! No issues checking in and no issues checking out !
Definitely booking again when I’m in the area !
Great place in a great location. Carson was extremely helpful and accommodating!
I slept so great,

really nice place and it is huge for a studio. I've spent at least 30 nights in airbnb. this place has the most comfortable bed out of all of them. I was a little disappointed that there wasn't any coffee there but it wasn't a big deal.
The place was nice, liked that there were two bars across the street and really enjoyed my stay
Overall a great visit. If you like out of the ordinnnary you will enjoy your stay on the square in Snyder Texas.
Great stay! We had a mix up with one of his other properties so he offered this new AirBnB to us, worked out great!
Very unique place, great small town city square feel. The traffic noise could be heard (semi’s) but over all great place to stay.
Carson is very friendly, and accommodating. His place is very comfortable and has a nice open floor plan.
This was a great place to stay!! Downtown fun, shopping & local pubs!
Absolutely amazing host and awesome place to stay!
Excellent stay, very cool loft style studio right in a historic downtown area.
Great stay no complaints
good place, we rest after being on the road

It was a great place to stay at for a quick overnight stay over. Place was spotless & tidy. A lot of restaurants and pubs close by. Some are even in walking distance. Would definitely stay here again.
Cool studio right smack in downtown Snyder- quiet and clean with everything we needed. Will stay here again when driving from Colorado to Austin
Wonderful home full of things to do and places to relax. Thank you!
Its always been great staying at Dawn's Home. Its just what we were looking for.
Peaceful country home with game spaces for kids.

We had a wonderful time celebrating our large family Christmas! it was very comfortable for us, 5 adults and three kiddos. The kitchen was set up well and had all we needed. Plenty of space to host gatherings and hang out! We will for sure be back!
This was our family’s third year here!!! We WILL continue this tradition. Dawn is so amazing and my family has fallen in love with her house!!! It is our style and very private!

Dawn’s place in the middle of the wind turbines was a unique experience. We had events in Sweetwater so it was a 1/2 hr drive each way, but well worth it.
We loved how isolated it was! It was very clean & comfortable with lots of extras.
We had a ball playing pingpong.
Fantastic place!
The place is a quiet country escape! Perfect for getting away from it all. I highly recommend it!
We loved staying at Dawn’s ranch house. It was very peaceful and the place was clean and nice. Dawn was helpful and communicated great!
Very private area with ranch house style feeling
Absolutely loved your home! Decor was perfect as well as the bathrooms! Very peaceful & quiet setting. Thank you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful home!
Everything was as advertised. Hope to be back next year.
We loved our stay! The house was perfect for our family to get together. The kids absolutely loved the ping pong table and shuffle board. We will definitely be back!
we didn't arrive until 1:00 a.m. so it was a little difficult to find that late but it was a nice place & great for a large family.

Such a beautiful home! Its a great location for a weekend away to relax and rest! It is very quiet and peaceful and offers the opportunity to spend time with your family without distractions. We had an amazing weekend and will definitely be goung back!
The ranch was beautiful. It was an amazing spot! Everything was just as it looked in the photos, we had a perfect getaway weekend. Thank you Dawn!
Everything you need is there!!! Lots of games! Beautiful place!
This home is well taken care of and always clean. This is a great place to stay!
Great spot to stay with plenty of games and fun for the whole family. Will definitely stay again!
Great location to get away from people and all the traffic, stargazing was great, even seen the falcon 9 launch from the back yard.

This place was wonderful!! It was our 23rd annual girls weekend out. 7 of us and plenty of room. Decorated so well too. We loved the sunrises and sunsets and view of so many windmills!! Highly recommend d it. Only drawback was it’s so far out there lol!

This place is amazing! It's private, spacious, and cozy. Plenty of room to stretch out and relax with mostly everyhting you'll need for a short weekend or long week's stay. And superhost is an understatement.
Wonderful place to stay. Quiet, clean, and comfortable for our big family.

Lee’s Lonestar Ranch is a nice getaway for a big group. Plenty of comfortable space to stretch out and relax. It has a well stocked kitchen and beautiful sunsets. It was nice and clean. The host are very responsive to communication. We have stayed here twice and had an excellent experience both times.
This place is amazing. If you want country, this is the place to go. so peaceful and quiet. highly recommend this place.
Lee’s Lonestar Ranch is the best Airbnb experience we’ve ever had! Tranquil, unique, like you’re at home but nicer.

Great place to stay if you're near Sweetwater or Abilene. Lounge was amazing, beds were great. House is fully stocked with dishes, furniture, linen, etc. Just bring food, drinks, and good times. Will be back!

We throughly enjoyed this ranch home. It’s about 20 minutes away from Sweetwater/buffalo gap and 30 minutes away from Abilene. It’s not for the faint of heart to get to but it’s worth it. The home is located on about 1 acre of ranch land tucked amongst the windmills. The sunrise and sunset are to die for. It’s absolutely filled with peaceful serenity. The house came well stocked with spices and coffee. The beds were comfortable and I appreciated that all the mattresses and pillows had covers on them (and not the cheap plastic kind) there are plenty of throw blankets to wrap yourself up in. We rented it out for visiting family members and they enjoyed the game room. It’s the perfect home for a family gathering. The only thing I could have possibly wished for was a hammock. Would absolutely stay again. Make sure to stock up before heading out there as groceries are not easily accessible.

This was our second time staying here for the collegiate national stock horse competition in Sweetwater. It is a super easy drive to Nolan county coliseum. It is so easy to relax and host a dinner for a large group here. The windmills are beautiful and the scenery is breathtaking. The owners were easy to communicate with and made sure we had everything we needed.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. House was clean and stocked luckily with a few small items we forgot, land was beautiful. We enjoyed the Clay/ Shooting range. My wife loved the horses and my 9y/o enjoyed too much to list. We will definitely be back. Thanks Dawn

Great place to stay. Lots of comfortable space to gather and relax. The beds were wonderful and the hosts had everything you needed!
Will definitely come again.

Our family enjoyed staying in this beautiful house. There are so many activities to keep all age groups happy. The bedrooms were very comfortable and is excellent for a large family. We would differently stay again at this charming place.
Very comfortable and neat home at a secluded location
Love this house in the middle of nowhere!!

Dawns place was a great get-away. Very good fire pit, was able to shoot skeet and handguns. If your looking for a stay that is secluded, this is the place! The house accommodated my entire group, came fully stocked with cooked ware and utensils, and Even had spices.
definitely worth it
We had a wonderful weekend. Beautiful home in a wonderful setting.
Wonderful place to stay with our large family. The game room was so neat and kept our kids entertained! Would definitely stay again and recommend to others.
What an interesting area. The home is comfortable and we really enjoyed the pool table and shuffleboard, spending evenings having tournaments. Great place to spend time with friends and family.
Completely blown away. I will be back.
This was an amazing stay for my family and I. My husband and 3 sons loved the game room and the outdoors. I thoroughly enjoyed the soaker tub and beauty of the home.
Second stay here and it was better than the first. The homeowners continue to improve it and it does not feel like a rental. Dawn is painless to work with, all around 5 stars.

The ranch was a perfect getaway for our family! The home was very clean and cozy! There are lots of games and space for your family to enjoy! Dawn was very helpful and responsive when we contacted her. Thinking about the time we spent here as a family brings a smile to our face and we will definitely stay again when we come back to Sweetwater! This place was an absolute gem!
Very homey and perfect for a large group!

We stayed here a week and it was great. If you need space in the country to relax, this is it! The wind turbines were surprisingly relaxing to watch. This is was best stocked Airbnb house we have rented. It had plenty of cookware, cups, spices, household items, etc. The land is far from neighbors and the skeet shooting field is fenced off from the back yard. It had a spring loaded and hand skeet thrower. The fire pit was quite high, making it safe for the kids to be around. There was plenty of dry firewood also. About the only improvement to the house would be to have dressers in the bed rooms.
It’s a little oasis out in the middle of west Texas! The solitude was awesome and the house was very comfy and clean!
Very responsive. We really enjoyed to space. House has a lot to offer.
Amazing and thoughtful owners and house.
You can expect a beautiful ranch home with peaceful remote setting! It doesn’t get much better then this
Dawn's country home is very tranquil. It felt like home away from home. Very well stocked with all the necessary amenities. My family enjoyed our stay. We will definitely be back!

Such an awesome place to stay and hangout with friends and family. Very quick response on every topics.
We are very glad to have spent 2 nights here.
Amazing. I recommend to any and everyone.
Awesome place!
Really beautiful place. Our family loved the wide open space and the kitchen had everything you can think of. Would stay again!

Honestly such a beautiful place. Breathtaking views of the wind turbines and we were lucky enough to have a red moon the night we stayed. I felt safe and calm. Great communication. And not boring at all as my family played with the games throughout our stay. I would definitely recommend.

This place was great. My family and I had a great time relaxing here, playing games and enjoying the sunsets. The place had a lot of necessities already provided such as cooking tools, soaps, shampoos etc. The place was clean on arrival. Beds comfy. Communication was great. Will definitely be back!

Lee's Lonestar Ranch was amazing. We had some family business in Abilene. We wanted a place where our extended family could gather together. We loved getting away from the hustle and bustle of the city. There was plenty of room for us to gather and for the kids to play. The house was clean and beautiful. Dawn and Andy were only a phone call away and responded quickly to the questions I texted to them.
We look forward to returning when we have more time to stay and play.
I highly recommend Lee's Lonestar Ranch!

We had a very good time in this lovely house, with our friends (4 adults and 5 kids). Kids enjoyed playing pool and the many games available. Kitchen is well equiped making it easy to prepare meals for all. Beautiful bathrooms too. Nice furniture and lot of room ! we recommand this place !
Beautiful and peaceful place to stay!

Beautiful place! The location is perfect for a getaway!
Nice and peaceful!
Super clean! Nice restrooms! Nice everything! Would definitely recommend this place!
Fantastic place to stay. Lots of beds and lots of room in a nice house with lots of amenities and things to do. Clean and well suited for a group gathering.

This is the second time we have stayed at Dawn’s. This is our go to stop when going to visit family. It is nice and quiet after a day of travel with plenty of room to spread out and an air conditioner that keeps up with the Texas heat. Wonderful beds and bedding and well stocked cooking. There is nothing this home is lacking.

It was amazing! Dawn has everything you need for a at home feeling on her ranch! It was so peaceful and the view night sky is an added amenity! My kids played volleyball and kickball in the large yard and ran around until they were too tired to do anything but sleep the night away! I would definitely go back and I would definitely recommend!

Dawn is nothing short of an exceptional host! She answers quickly, offers more than anyone could expect and makes sure your stay is nothing but perfect! The home was spectacular. There was tons of space and the beds were extemporaneous comfortable. There is a huge yard to play in and the shooting “range” is right next to the house so you can run out there when you are ready to practice! We walked to the wind mill on the property and enjoyed nothing but serenity and peace and quite. This place is secluded, spacious, and offers plenty of space. The home is adorable and there are PLENTY of towels and blankets. We enjoyed ourselves a lot for a quick weekend away. We will be back!

The property has everything you need, it will definitely exceed your expectations. The host is extremely accommodating and thoughtful, great place to have family gatherings in a quiet country place. Will be back soon!

This is a wonderful place to take your family, relax and enjoy the peace and quite. We had 7 people in our party from 7 to 85 and everyone enjoyed the stay. The kitchen was well stocked, lots of towels, everything was just perfect.

January 24-26, 2020 was our second stay at this fabulous location and our large family was just as pleased this year with the accommodations as before! Our crew utilized the outdoor target range for some shooting practice, enjoyed games of pool and were able to view different movies on multiple TV's located throughout the home. It is a spacious home, with designer qualities and we love it. Dawn is a fantastic host and responds immediately to any inquiry.
A great place to get away and have a great time with family.
Highly suggest this place! It was like a home while we were there.

Dawn’s place is great! We could not have asked for more. She accommodated us in just a few days notice and was quick to respond. We like seclusion and her place has it. There was only one neighbor we could see way off in the distance and plenty of room for the kids and dog to run without worrying about traffic. Very peaceful and quiet. Her home is stocked plentiful with everything you need plus more. Plenty of cooking supplies and the extra touch of coffee, creamer and spices were much appreciated. This will be our go to place in the future in the way to visit family.
Great home. Clean and comfortable. Very spacious!
Stylish space with all you need. Peaceful and worth it!
It’s a great place to have a great getaway with the family. Loved the environment and the space it gave us. Will recommend this great home to anyone that needs a vacation away from the city.

Lee’s Lonestar Ranch is a great get away. It is a large space for a large group of people to come together and relax, and catch up. The amenities are fantastic. My entire family loved it! The host is great and very helpful. If you need a big place to get away and relax, this is it.
Dawn is a great host. We loved out time there. Thanks!
Great place for those looking to get away. Nice amenities with anything you might forget already available!
A beautiful place with lots of space for activities and relaxation. We had people from all over Texas, DC, and Florida, and we enjoyed the west Texas hospitality. Thank you!

This is a wonderful house!
I wish we could have stayed longer. It would be great for a large group gathering. We took in grocery and didn’t get back into the car until the end of our stay.
I highly recommend this house.
Very fun and relaxing place to stay. Good for the whole family. Clean, lots of space and privacy. Lots of amenities.

Seventeen of our family members gathered at this rental property over a weekend. We brought a few inflatable mattresses to sleep extra people and there was ample floor space to accommodate those. The property exterior is unassuming, but features a totally modern interior, with everything you could possibly need. Here are a few features which made our stay exceptional: Ample supplies of toilet paper, clean towels & wash rags, bedding & pillows, body wash, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, washing machine, dryer, one coffee pot, one Keurig coffee maker and a fully furnished kitchen with updated appliances. A pool table, multiple shelves stocked with games, a dart board, a fantastic gas fireplace, three flat screen TV's and a wonderful fire pit, steps from the back porch. Located out in the middle of nowhere, affording you plenty of privacy, beautiful sunsets and relaxation. We give this property and this hostess our highest recommendation!

The house was very clean and was even better than expected. It was very spacious with plenty of room for everyone to enjoy themselves. We enjoyed the coffee that was provided and shooting pool and playing games that were also provided. There was plenty of linens, toiletries if needed, and kitchen supplies. It was too cold to spend time outside but the yard would have been a great place for the kids to play volleyball, soccer or football. The owners are very quick to respond to any questions also. I would definitely rent this place again if we’re ever in the sweetwater area again.
Very clean and spacious.

Everything was absolutely wonderful! The house was perfect and the location was so peaceful. We all loved that there were many places to relax and unwind within the house. Loved the combination of the rustic decor with the spa-like bathrooms. The house was both functional and inviting. The kitchen had everything we needed to put on a giant Thanksgiving feast! We had a fantastic time shooting skeet, and my husband loved being able to target shoot as well. Great place to bring the family together. We enjoyed every minute!
Beautiful and peaceful hop skip and a jump from Sweetwater.

An extremely well equipped kitchen, a magnificent fireplace, games, pool table AND a multitude of wind turbines in the back yard! If you're looking to get some quiet time, this comfortable house is ideal.
Quiet location, host was quick to respond. Quiet and pretty location
Had an amazing stay at Pelican bay! We had a great get away this weekend!
We love staying here. Forrest and Betty are the best host. This is our favorite Airbnb home. Very clean, AND the backyard is so AMAZING…. Very tranquil.

Communication was great! The home was easy to find and instructions where very clear. Beautiful, clean home and plenty of space to hang out. We came to Abilene to visit with our son who is stationed there. It was nice for him to have a nice home to relax in since he lives on base. I hope we can visit again this year and if this home is available, we would stay again! thank you
Such a beautiful home! Thank you!
Wonderful home! Great hosts! Very friendly and helpful!
Thanks wish we could have stayed longer!
Beautiful house and back yard!! Quiet and beautiful neighborhood. Top choice
Forest and Betty are wonderful hosts. Their place was very comfortable, handy to the activities we wanted to do, and the backyard is a jewel.
The house was beautiful inside & out. Nice quiet neighborhood and felt secure. Definitely a much better choice than finding a hotel.
Very peaceful and beautiful home. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
We absolutely loved this airbnb and hope to make this a yearly spot to return to! Wefelt right at home and it was so beautiful

Forrest and Betty have a beautiful place, great location and great energy! more than we could have hoped for!
we were able to work out every morning and then go for a walk in the neighborhood!
We felt at home during our stay and were able to have a relaxing Thanksgiving vacation. Thank you for allowing us to enjoy your home.

I really enjoyed the stay. I wanted a place we could really enjoy as a family whether we stayed in or went out and both were perfect. Beautiful house and very nice back yard. I hope to stay there again next year if we come again.

We really enjoyed the house, everything was clean and spacious. My friend and I were there for a golf tournament and had to stay a week. With that being said we had a great week and can’t thank Forrest and Betty enough

Forrest & Betty have a beautiful home! The back patio and garden are a wonderful place for morning coffee or just a peaceful place to take a break. The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and comfortable. We felt right at home there and would absolutely return.

Forrest & Betty were very quick to respond to any questions we had. Their home is beautiful and looked like a model home. Very quiet and peaceful neighborhood. The backyard is great as well. There was one issue (with the coffee machine) and it was resolved in a few hours, even though we didn’t need it to be. Very friendly hosts. Would definitely recommend and stay there again.
Nice quite place to stay. Would recommend to others and come back again. They were very quick to respond when. asked questions.
We enjoyed the quiet neighborhood and backyard. Clean home and we found it easy to relax and rest.

Beautiful & spacious home. Exactly how it was listed. Very responsive when we had questions. The backyard is beautiful!!! We enjoyed our coffee there in the morning….watching the birds flutter around. And enjoyed the backyard in the evenings looking at the stars.
Quiet neighborhood…stores & restaurants are about a 10-15 minute drive.
I liked that there was very clear instructions on how to use certain things…and instructions/rules on what is ok/not ok in the house.
We had a wonderful stay…and if in the area, would definitely book again!!
The home was perfect. Fully furnished with many amenities. Would stay again. The hosts were very accommodating.

The house was very nice and very clean! And had everything we needed!! Their backyard is amazing!! Just wish it hadn’t been so hot and that we could have enjoyed it more! We would definitely stay there again if we are in that area!! Betty and Forrest were great hosts! They were very quick to get back to me anytime I reached out to them! Thanks for sharing your beautiful home with us! We had a very relaxing stay!

This is a very welcoming and peaceful home. Quiet neighborhood. The prayer garden is beautiful. This is our second time to stay in this home and will stay again when in the Abilene area if possible. Well worth the money.

Forest and Betty’s home in Abilene was beautiful, extra clean and peaceful, it was the perfect home away from home for my wife, her parents and I while we celebrated her brothers wedding. The master suite is on the opposite side of the house from the other bedrooms which is great for privacy.
The garden out back was a beautiful and peaceful oasis that we loved drinking our coffee in during the mornings and stargazing in at night.
Would/will definitely stay here again

Absolutely loved the stay! We wanted to stay just for the comfort. The back yard view was amazing to drink your coffee in the morning. Loves seeing the deer run in the field. Great host ! Hot water was the best!!! Beds were perfect. TV is confusing but they left perfect detailed instructions on everting.
Beautiful house, responsive hosts. We enjoyed just sitting around and catching up. When I come back to visit I will definitely stay here again.

I found this place exceeded my expectations. It's a great value for the price. It's peaceful, comfortable, and spacious. This is why we have returned to this home multiple times. Thank you, Forest and Betty!

We enjoyed are stay for my daughters graduation. Betty also left me bring a couple extra family members for the occasion. Check in and check out was very clear and easy. The home was beautiful and clean. Thank you again Betty.

Forrest and Betty were very responsive and their home was beautiful with the amazing patio space as an added perk! Me and my husband brought my elderly parents and his mother to watch my daughter graduate from ACU and none of them have ever stayed in an AirBnB and were amazed that I got that size house with plenty of bedrooms and space for the weekend for the price they charged. It was well worth the price and everything inside was clean and pristine! We are coming back in June to move my daughter out of her duplex and I hope this place is available that weekend because it’s an amazing place. The large towels were also a very nice touch. Thanks for sharing your home!

Thank you for letting us use you house. We enjoyed visiting with our daughters and grandchildren. We felt like we were home.
Thanks
David richard

I have finally found my home away from home in Texas. Beautiful home & as described In the photos. The neighborhood was safe & convenient to everything we needed. The back yard was so relaxing and private. I would recommend this property to anyone traveling alone or with family. THIS NC USAF MOM will definitely be back.

Forrest and Betty have a very beautiful home if your looking for a quiet neighbor hood to relax in after a long day you’d be hard pressed to find a better place to do so. The house is very comfortable and modern. The garden and back patio are fantastic. And their back garden has a fantastic view out to the countryside

Great house to stay in while visiting Abilene. Betty and Forrest were amazing host, very friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay here again.
Mike and Kim
Beautiful home, very comfortable and the backyard is awesome. Fully equipped kitchen, comfortable beds, peaceful neighborhood. We will definitely stay again.

Beautiful home , enjoyed the thoughtfulness, put in every room. Even though close to anything you would need as far as shopping and stores it only takes a quick view into backyard for a beautiful view that gave a feeling of being in the countryside. Top-notch ,would love to visit again sometime .

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at your lovely home! The decorations made us feel right at home. It was comfortable as well as beautiful inside and out. We wish we could have stayed longer and when we return to Abilene we hope to stay here again.
The home was wonderful and exactly what I hoped it would be. Plenty of space and easy to get to. We would love to stay there again if we make it to Abilene. Thank you!!
Very charming backyard and cozy home. master suite is the icing on the cake. I would love to stay here again in the warmer months.

We loved this airbnb. The home was absolutely lovely and very spacious. It included everything to make it a very comfortable and enjoyable visit. Our hosts were so responsive when we had a couple of questions. The kitchen is stocked with all the appliances, tableware, dinnerware, pots ect. for you to create your own meals. The backyard is spectacular and such a peaceful retreat. The home was super clean with plenty of towels ect. Would recommend this home to anyone.
Karen H.
We were very satisfied with our stay and the location was very peaceful.
The home was outstanding. It was clean and very comfortable. Forrest and Betty were extremely easy to work with and any questions was answered quickly. I can highly recommend this rental.
This is a great place to stay in Abilene! So much space, very well equipped and maintained, and the 2 are so quick to respond. We would always come back and had a wonderful time!
Lovely, peaceful home and wonderful hosts!!
We enjoyed our stay. The house was clean and had mostly everything we needed. Highly recommend. We just wish we could have it for longer.
The house was perfect! Very pretty house and area. The shower in master is amazing. Lol my mom enjoyed the coffee area! The backyard is so pretty! Thank you for allowing us to stay!
Lovely home with a beautiful and relaxing back yard. The hosts communicated with us several times before our visit. Would highly recommend them.
Fantastic place to stay! Easy and convenient to get to stores. Great hosts!
We had a wonderful time! The house was very clean and equipped. The backyard is beautiful and we enjoyed relaxing on the patio. Many thanks for your great hospitality!
Forrest and Betty's home was just lovely! I would recommend staying there if you're I the area.
A great place to stay! The hosts were extremely accommodating and friendly. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone in staying in Abilene.
Perfect, clean, safe, and every comfort of home. Beautiful back yard and view.
Beautiful home, very clean and in a quiet neighborhood. Beautiful and comforting backyard. A great place to stay.
Very quiet and relaxing location. 10-minute drive from shopping and easy access to other amenities around Abilene.
The most beautiful home and backyard we stayed at on our recent trip to Abilene, TX. We highly recommend this location and Forest and Betty are great hosts.
Such a great place! Extremely relaxing and very charming!
Beautiful home in a great neighborhood! It was very spacious. I strongly recommend. The hosts communicated well I enjoyed every part of the stay.
This property is beautiful and peaceful. It doesn’t disappoint. Neither do the owners. Totally recommend it.
Amazing people and very helpful

This home is perfect in every way! It is clean and spacious! Our favorite spot was in the back yard watching and listening to the birds and looking at the beautiful flowers. In addition, it is in a great location! We will definitely check availability when we need a place to stay in Abilene!
Home was very comfortable and the views in the back yard were amazing. Highly recommend this home to anyone who needs a home away from home.

Beautiful home! Very clean and comfortable. The backward is amazing, very peaceful and a great escape. Home is in a great neighborhood and just a short drive into town. Forrest and Betty are amazing hosts. Very communicative and responsive.
Beautiful home, nice and peaceful area. The backyard is gorgeous. Would love to visit again.

We honestly can't say enough about this Airbnb & the hosts Forrest & Betty! The house was absolutely beautiful, inside & out!! The backyard was so peaceful & relaxing. We will absolutely stay here again, if we get back to Abilene. Thanks again Forrest & Betty, for opening up your home!
Lovely stay! Awesome house. Would love to stay here again on our next trip to town. Lovely hosts! Stay here you won’t regret!

If you are looking for a home away from home, this is your place. The house was immaculate and very comfortable. I hesitate to say too much, for fear the house won’t be available to us when we travel to Abilene from now on! Great neighborhood, friendly owners, peaceful backyard featuring calming water features, comfy furniture… I could go on and on. We have definitely found our go-to house for when we visit!
We enjoyed our stay in this beautiful home! Plenty of space, clean & comfortable. The back patio view and back yard is amazing. Thank you so much for hosting us! :)
Great hosts and a beautiful home! Great location! We would love to stay here again the next time we are in Abilene. Would definitely recommend.

We really appreciated the cleanliness, essential amenities, and the quiet backyard patio with peaceful views. Forrest and Betty were excellent hosts with timely communication and even happily let us return back to the house to retrieve a left-behind item. The location isn’t far from stores, and downtown attractions. Highly recommend this bnb!

This was hands down the *BEST* place to stay in Abilene! We’re military and arrived here before our new house was ready, but we needed somewhere less expensive than the base hotel to stay for a few months. Not only was the price at this air bnb better per night, but the location was perfect (10 min to base and practically everything in Abilene). Plus, you get entire house to yourselves to stretch out and it was oh so relaxing! It’s a safe neighborhood, quiet, and the backyard view was amazing. Plus, it was immaculately clean and comfortable with great wifi. The owners are fantastic to work with as well! You can’t go wrong booking this air bnb. We’re so glad to have stayed at this air bnb! Thank you.

We highly enjoyed our stay here. It was very relaxing Betty and Forrest were great host. We would definitely stay here again in the future. It was very clean and they thought of everything to make our stay perfect. Thank you Betty and Forrest.

Seriously enjoyed this lil hidden gem! Stayed here as a half way spot between Santa Fe and Austin! Really enjoyed how quaint it was & loved the lil personal touch Judy left as a welcome! The views were much better than if I had stayed in Lubbock or Abilene & it was quite peaceful out there! Thanks Judy.
Super cute and peaceful space! I left something during my stay and Judy is shipping it to me and answered my call immediately.
We had a great peaceful stay at Judy’s, our dogs really enjoyed the outdoor space. Very private, we will be staying here again
Such a cool little place! Very relaxing and quiet & Judy was an amazing hostess! We will definitely need to come back!
